welcome_message_body: Welcome to the Bronx, where the vibrant culture and rich history of New York City come to life. From the iconic Bronx Zoo to the beautiful Botanical Garden, we invite you to explore and indulge in all the charm this borough has to offer. Enjoy your stay!
